author: By Emma Munbodh
title: Thomson Holidays best late deals including Majorca, Tenerife and Costa Blanca
text:
Are you after a last minute holiday on a budget? Those after a cheap escape can take advantage of some tempting offers this season.
Read on for some of the best late deals from Thomson Holidays to Majorca the Dominican Republic and more flying from the UK.
For more holiday deals and hacks, see our Tripadvisor bargain flights guide , or our cheap holidays page for up-to-the minute sales.
Going on a city break? Here are 10 places to visit, and how to do it for less .
For cheap UK breaks this summer holiday, see our guide on the Park Holidays sale here - with breaks from £119 to Devon for the whole family.
Costa Blanca, £524 per person, half board
Thomson is offering seven night holidays to Costa Blanca staying at the 5-star Thomson Platinum Hotel Don Pancho on a half board basis from £514 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing and includes flights departing from Newcastle airport on 15 August 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book click here .
Majorca, £425 per person, half board
Thomson is offering seven night holidays to Tenerife staying at 4-star Sol Antillas Barbados on a half board basis from £425 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing, and includes flights departing from Edinburgh airport on 26 August 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book visit Thomson Holidays here .
Bulgaria, £643 per person, half board
Thomson is offering seven night holidays to Bulgaria staying at the 4-star Thomson Platinum Hotel Majestic Beach on a half board basis from £643 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing, and includes flights departing from London Gatwick airport on 20 August 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book click here .
Tenerife, £619 per person, bed and breakfast
Thomson is offering seven night holidays to Tenerife staying at the 5-star Thomson A La Carte Mare Nostrum Cleopatra Palace on a bed and breakfast basis from £619 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing, and includes flights departing from Manchester airport on 30 August 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book visit Thomson Holidays here .
Dominican Republic, £1,175 per person, all inclusive
Thomson is offering 14-night holidays to the Dominican Republic staying at the 4-star Clubhotel Riu Bachata on an all-inclusive basis from £1,175 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing, and includes flights departing from Manchester airport on 29 August 2015 and transfers
To find out more about this holiday or to book click here .
